overview:
Prior to joining Novak Biddle Venture Partners, Annie worked at one of NBVP’s portfolio companies (Intelli7, Inc.) as their Controller. Before joining Intelli7 Annie was a regional representative for one of the largest for-profit adult recreation leagues in the country based out of Washington D.C. She also spent time working for the Department of the Navy’s Morale, Welfare and Recreation program, managing the day-to-day activities and conducting long-term event planning for a high-volume and profile military installation.

Annie earned her Bachelor of Science degree from Winona State University, where she graduated cum laude.
